title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
​1 point is earned for sets a(k) = 20.5

1 point is earned for integral

1 point is earned for answer

a ( k ) = 20.5 ⇒ k = 0.892040 ∫ 0 k ( 20.5 − a ( t ) ) d t = 10.599191

At time t = k, the difference in the amounts of water in the tanks is 10.599 liters.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
​1 point is earned for ∫ k 2.416 a( t ) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43E6@

1 point is earned for answer

∫ 0 2.416 b( t ) dt= ∫ 0 k b( t )dt+ ∫ k 2.416 b( t ) dt ∫ 0 k b( t ) dt=20.5⋅k=18.286826 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@72DD@

​On k < t < 2.416, tank A receives ∫ k 2.416 a( t ) dt=44.497051 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49B2@ liters of water, which is 14.470 more liters of water than tank B.​

Therefore,  ∫ k 2.416 b( t ) dt= ∫ k 2.416 a( t ) dt−14.470=30.027051. ∫ 0 k b( t ) dt+ ∫ k 2.416 b( t ) dt=48.313876 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8605@

At time t = 2.416, tank B contains 48.314 (or 48.313) liters of water.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for w'(3.5) - a'(3.5) < 0

1 point is earned for conclusion

w'(3.5) - a'(3.5) = -1.14298 < 0

The difference w(t) - a(t) is decreasing at t = 3.5.
